attributes.action: investigate the use of white phosphorus by Israeli armed forces against the civilian population of Gaza. If this is verified we call for accountable personnel to be tried for war crimes in The Hague.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It has been alleged by human rights observers that white phosphorus is being used against the civilian population of Gaza. While there is no outright ban on this weapon, it is banned for use in populated areas. Gaza is one of the most heavily populated places on earth.
